cyclone.name: HENRI
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to move west today, then turn northwest and north toward the U.S. mid-Atlantic and southern New England waters late this week-end

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watch only in effect for Bermuda
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Swells and rip-currents expected along the southeast and mid-Atlantic U.S. coast late week; greatest direct wind threat toward southern New England
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤3%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; breezy conditions possible late Saturday–Sunday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Long-period swells may produce minor coastal flooding, but significant surge (>3 ft) not expected in Delaware Bay
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands could drop 1–2 inches of rain late Saturday into Sunday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along Delaware beaches beginning Friday
